p: The chemical analysis of this essential oil was complemented with the enantioselective one, where the enantiomeric distribution and the enantiomeric excess ( e.e.) of some monoterpenes and monoterpenoids were determined and confirmed on two different enantioselective columns. None of the detected chiral metabolites was present in its enantiomerically pure form, however β-pinene and linalool were almost racemic, with just a small e.e. in favor of (1 S,5 S)-(-)-β-pinene and ( R)-(-)-linalool.
